<!--

classDiagram
class email{
 *VARCHAR uid NOT NULL
   VARCHAR bcc
   VARCHAR body
   VARCHAR cc
   DATETIME created_at NOT NULL
   VARCHAR id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR sender
   VARCHAR subject NOT NULL
   VARCHAR to
   VARCHAR tracking_id
   VARCHAR type NOT NULL
   DATETIME updated_at
}
class tag{
 *VARCHAR uid NOT NULL
   DATETIME created_at NOT NULL
   VARCHAR id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR name NOT NULL
   DATETIME updated_at
}
class tag_team_link{
 *VARCHAR tag_id NOT NULL
   *VARCHAR team_id NOT NULL
}
class team{
 *VARCHAR uid NOT NULL
   DATETIME created_at NOT NULL
   VARCHAR headquarters NOT NULL
   VARCHAR id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR name NOT NULL
   DATETIME updated_at
}
class task{
 *VARCHAR uid NOT NULL
   JSON context
   DATETIME created_at NOT NULL
   VARCHAR created_by
   VARCHAR description
   JSON email_notification
   DATETIME ended_at
   VARCHAR id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR message
   VARCHAR name NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<11> status NOT NULL
   DATETIME task_duration
   VARCHAR type NOT NULL
   DATETIME updated_at
}
class user{
 *VARCHAR uid NOT NULL
   DATETIME created_at NOT NULL
   VARCHAR email NOT NULL
   VARCHAR first_name NOT NULL
   VARCHAR id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR last_name NOT NULL
   VARCHAR name NOT NULL
   VARCHAR team_id
   DATETIME updated_at
}
team "1" -- "0..n" tag_team_link
tag "1" -- "0..n" tag_team_link
team "0..1" -- "0..n" user

-->
